segments.text: I glance at the woman, who is completely absorbed in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost comical how unaware she is of the growing mess at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus on the plate seems so intense; I can’t help but feel a little amused.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then I feel that amusement shift to concern as I see the water streaming down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching further and further, and it makes me want to shout for him to stop.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What if he falls? The thought sends a shiver down my spine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl, so eager for the cookies, looks up at him with wide eyes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There’s a kind of innocence in their mischief that pulls at my heartstrings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet I can’t ignore the increasing risk of disaster that looms over them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a bittersweet scene, one full of laughter yet tinged with danger.
segments.speaker: PAR
